sections.heading: agricultural society; right of eminent domain; procedure
sections.text: Each county agricultural society may acquire, take, hold, and appropriate so much real estate as may be necessary for the purpose of holding county fairs. No appropriation of private property for the use of such society shall be made until ful

sections.heading: in tracing history of act. Owen v. Main, 92 Neb. 258, 138 N.W. 154 (1912).
